channel.title: Help on 2 things !?
channel.description:
Well i have some annoying bugs , that keeps people away from playing on my server :(
I'd like to fix those things , but i have no cleu...
Plz help me on thse 2 things
1 = Npc's = When a new player logs on and want to train on A man .. and u keep hitting 1's till its on 1 hp .. then its stuck and wont die anymore... , only range can go trough the bug..
How i make it so that it will die when its on 1 hp ..??
2 = My shops .. = The npc's are walking trought objects/walls .. how i stop them from doing that
THnx if u help me :)

item.title: Help on 2 things !?
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:2, topic:136200”]I don’t know how to fix one, but specials kill them too.

And for two, you just have to set certain areas they walk to so they don’t walk through anything they see.[/quote]

errm … Isnt it possible that i can make them just see nothing …?? , just a code that stop them walking trough it…?
